    Calls methods required to setup the farm

    Sets up the Farmer to be used for the game, including prompting user for a valid farmer name input and age input, repeating until they are given

    Sets up the farm name, prompting for input until a valid one if given.

      private Item getItemToBeUsed​(java.lang.String type)
      Based on the given type of Item that is desired, will provide options to user that suit said type and gets input from the user, returning the appropriate result.
      Parameters:
      type - - String of "Food" or "Crop"
      Returns:
      Item - Item that will be used
